January IS* 1951
Mr. Charter Heslep, Chief
R-dio-Televiaion Branch
U.S, Atomic Energy Commie si as
Washington 25, C.
Dear Charter*
I appreciate your letter of January 16, and 1
cannot tell you how grateful I a® to you for keeping
the MEB network in mind* in connection with the WLS
program series on atomio energy*
I am writing direst to Cleon Snyder, asking
him to make the tapes available to Richard Rider, who
is now the network coordinator at the University of
Illinois. This will make it extremely convenient for
the people in Chicago to work together.
With all best wishes, I am
Cordially yours.
Seymour H, Siegel
President, HAEB
®S*as
oe* Rider
